name: Dead Space Monkey
description:
Made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020

Rushed as always expect bugs and fixes as well as the WebGl version.

Sorry Giftee, but this is what you signed up for!

On a side not level 2 is unreasonably hard. If you get stuck just use the "unlockall" cheat code.

Controls that I didn't explain, but might be useful:

  • m to open menu
  • middle mouse button to slide the camera
  • 1-7 hotkeys for tiles
